## WithVariants type

Adds a variant property to the object.

This is used with the `SxThemeProp` and allow a user to configure the variant to use for the active style.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type WithVariants<GObject extends {}> = GObject & {
    variant?: string;
};
```
